title: Hermann Göring
summary: Hermann Wilhelm Göring (or Goering;[lower-alpha 1] German: [ˈɡøːʁɪŋ] (listen); 12 January 1893 – 15 October 1946) was a German politician, military leader and convicted war criminal. He was one of the most powerful figures in the Nazi Party, which ruled Germany from 1933 to 1945.
